name: Hardcore-flat-Tweetdeck
description:
Just some tweaks I made because I didn't like tweetdeck's default style, I did it for myself, but I'm sharing in case anyone cares.

This version is for hardcore people and it is a modified version of my own other thingy here: http://userstyles.org/styles/97578/tweetdeck-moar-flat-design-no-scrollbars

Changes:
- No animations
- Modified style
- Everything is now squares (no rounding)
- Almost everything takes less space
- No scroll bars (still scrollable via mouse wheel)
- CHANGE ALL THE MARGINS /o
- CHANGE ALL THE PADDINGS /o

additional_info:
V1:
Release.

V1.01
Fixed: inline reply not showing properly (I just added an exception like for column settings to allow it to animate, too lazy)

V1.011
Disabled that crappy star animation when favoriting a tweet.

V2
Reduced the size of those avatars. Moar texts.
And some bug fixes.

V2.01
No more padding between screen edges and columns, even moar texts
And reduced the margin between names and actual tweets.

V2.02
Corrected the column margins and some tweaks here and there

v2.05
Corrected a bit the tweet details, changed margins.

V3
Fuck it too much bugs, added animations back and fixed some things here and there (also, avatars are better when you're viewing a profile)

v4
Disabled animations again, but made an exception for the new tweets arriving in a column : works again.
Made avatars smaller in columns.
Made User name (shown before the @) full white so it's more easily distinguished from the rest.
And some more tweaks here and there.
